casebody.data:
Butler County Bar Association v. Doll.

[Cite as Butler Cty. Bar Assn. v. Doll (1997), 80 Ohio St.3d 273.]

(No. 97-1299 Submitted August 26, 1997 Decided November 19, 1997.) *274Patricia S. Oney and Gary H. Kaup, for relator. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
